page.title: 19N.E.E.D.E.S.
page.content: In 1967 {Ken Easton}started the { {North East Essex Doctors Emergency {Service. Dr Gibson,}who lives near { {Panfield,}came to school and told us about the service.{NEEDES}covers from {Braintree}to{Harwich}and around the coast.{Dr Gibson}covers the{Braintree area. {NEEDES}aims to get rapid medical treatment to accident victims before an ambulance can arrive. Emergency calls go to{Chelmsford}and a{NEEDES doctor is sent to the scene.{Dr Gibson is called out 70-80 times a year. { Dr Gibson}carries a green flashing light on his car,which is fitted with a two-way radio and a two- tone warning siren. He carries breathing apparatus, aspirator, splints, collar, back restraint, dressings and drugs.
